description: This is a React component for a Customer Form page that handles creating and editing customer data, utilizing React hooks such as useState and useEffect, and calling external API methods from CustomersAPI.

methods.name: CustomerForm()
methods.description: React functional component for creating and editing customer information.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to load customer data for editing.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Handles input changes and updates form state.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission for creating or updating customer.
